quest.name: Forever and Ever Apart
journal: Lyse would not delay in beginning the search for the Yasakani–no–Magatama.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'll admit I had my doubts, but this is a “blessing” worthy of the name. One cannot help wondering what other magicks the Kojin possess...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: If this is Sui–no–Sato, then Shiosai, the overseer, should be around here somewhere...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I daresay one of the locals will be able to point us in his direction.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Though...now that I look around, I get the distinct impression we are not welcome here...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: In a place like this, it's hard to tell where the important people live. I mean, everywhere has a sea view...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Soroban called him the overseer. One can only assume he is some sort of leader in the community...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: So...this is our man?

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: ...Leave this place and never return. We have no need of wide-eyed wanderers.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Sorry, I didn't mean to stare. My name is Lyse, and these are my friends, Forename and Alisaie.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We're looking for the overseer of Sui–no–Sato, Shiosai. That's you, isn't it?

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: ...The Kojin of the Blue sent you hither, did they?

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: I am no overseer, nor ever would I claim to be one. I am high priest of Shisui of the Violet Tides. Shiosai.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: So you are the man we're looking for! Great! We need your help. We're looking for this jewel called the Yasakani–no─

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: Stop. I will hear no more.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: We will suffer no outside troubles in our sanctuary. Especially those of would-be treasure hunters.

dialogue.name: ISOBE
dialogue.text: <chirp> <chirp>

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: Quiet, Isobe, or there will be no dango for dinner.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: Ahem. I can do naught to aid you. I say to you again, leave this place and never return.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...At the very least, sir, you might condescend to tell us of your village, and of why you are so loath to show us even the most basic courtesy.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: ...Sui–no–Sato is our sanctuary. Under the benevolent leadership of the Ruby Princess, sovereign of Shisui, we Raen enjoy humble yet fulfilling lives. But it was not always so.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: Long ago, our forebears were driven from their ancestral lands. Beneath the waters, they sought refuge from the ravages of war, and here they flourished. All that we are─our culture, our traditions─was born of the sea. As was I.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: Though we have engaged others in diplomacy, it has ever been with the utmost caution. Isolation and independence are essential to preserving our way of life.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: So it was when Doma fell twenty-five years past. The Ruby Princess, in her wisdom, decreed that we would take no part. As it was, so ever shall it be.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text:
Forever and ever apart...
Forgive me. I understand now how highly you value your way of life, and how you will suffer none to endanger it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You may be assured that we have no desire to do so. And I would hope that we have given you no cause to assume otherwise.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: ...You have not. But this changes nothing.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: Regardless of your intentions, it is not my place to break with tradition.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: I must consider the wishes of all who call Sui–no–Sato home. For me to defy their will and permit outsiders to remain would be a gross betrayal of my responsibilities. Please do not ask this of me.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Thank you for your time, sir.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Everywhere we go it's the same. “Go away, we don't want any.” You'd think I'd be used to it by now, but some stupid part of me just can't help hoping for the best.

dialogue.name: SHIOSAI
dialogue.text: It is not for me to make exceptions. I am bound by our rules, as are you. Please, leave us be.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And so it continues. Another village, another deaf ear.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Clearly, Gyr Abania is not the only place with walls.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm starting to wonder if this was all a huge mistake. Gosetsu couldn't have known we would take this long. I only hope he's still alive...
